channel.title: AutoJobR - AI-Powered Job Application Automation
channel.description: The ultimate AI-powered platform for automating job applications, beating ATS systems, and landing your dream job faster.

item.title: AutoJobR Platform Updated - Enhanced AI Job Matching
item.description: We've enhanced our AI job matching algorithm to provide even better job recommendations and automated application features.

item.title: Free ATS System Beating Tools Now Available
item.description: Access our free tools to optimize your resume and beat Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) for better job application success rates.

item.title: Chrome Extension for LinkedIn Auto-Apply
item.description: Our new Chrome extension helps you automatically apply to jobs on LinkedIn, Indeed, and other major job boards with AI-powered customization.

item.title: Apply to 1000+ Jobs Daily with AI Automation
item.description: Learn how AutoJobR's AI can help you apply to over 1000 jobs per day with personalized applications and cover letters.
